document_data.name: Shameo Water Lily
document_data.Description: The lily's pulpy roots were foraged by the [[Nubari]] [[Zantira]] tribe of [[human]]s that dwelt in the floating villages on Sleepy Lake. The roots were juiced and then fermented, creating the local speciality colorless and bitter alcohol simply called [[shameo]], one of the major exports of the Zantira.
